message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm initially offering it for $1,100,000.  I'm confident this price reflects the remarkable value it holds.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the market value. However, this product possesses unique features that significantly increase its inherent value. I'm willing to come down to $1,025,000. I believe this revised price reflects a fair compromise.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $1,025,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $950,000. That's the highest I'm willing to go.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I've tried to be flexible, but I have to be honest, anything under $980,000 wouldn't be fair to the value of this product. This is my final offer, as I do have other potential buyers interested.
